name: UMBRA (JaySilverES)
description:
Umbra is an independent 3D stealth action/adventure video game. The objective of the video game is to carry out the perfect robbery to the central bank of the United States. 

This will be guarded by several guards who will make your task more and more complicated as you progress through the game. 

The main idea is that the user does not have to use any weapon to be able to evade his opponents and reach the vault, . However, different weapons are also given at your disposal so as not to make the game so frustrating for the user. 

In the event that the user was detected by someone, he would have a total of three seconds to eliminate him without being detected, in case he did not succeed, the bank's alarm would go off, thus increasing the difficulty of the challenge
